text: Joely Fisher (born October 29, 1967) is an American actress. She played Nina on the ABC show Desperate Housewives. She also played Susan in the 1994 holiday comedy movie Mixed Nuts. Fisher was born in Burbank, California. In September 2021, Fisher was elected Secretary-Treasurer of SAG-AFTRA. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Burbank, California Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Joely Fisher
